title: Battletoads – v1.0F.41427
body:
Battletoads – v1.0F.41427


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Beat ’em up (Brawler), Side, 2D
Companies: Dlala Studios, Rare, Xbox Game Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI11
Original Size: 9.9 GB
Repack Size: from 3.1 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by Parnex)
  • Filehosters: DropArk + NitroFlare + MegaUp (Uploaded by Vikky793, not compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Battletoads-CODEX ISO release: codex-battletoads.iso (10,585,112,576 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (when installed with original cutscenes)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may download and install either original cutscenes (with excessive bitrate) or recoded ones (with much lower bitrate, but with almost the same visual quality)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 9.9 to 3.1/7.6 GB)
  • Installation takes 10-25 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 11 GB (up to 28 GB during installation) GB
  • Language can be changed in “Battletoads_Data\Plugins\steam_emu.ini” file
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

The wait is over! Rash, Zitz and Pimple are returning at last to smash-hit their way through an all-new action-packed adventure of choreographed chaos, and couch co-op may never be the same again.

1-3 players will take control of the Battletoads and team up to storm through wild and unpredictable stages with only one rule – expect the unexpected. Teamwork makes the dream work in a drop-in, drop-out gameplay blast, filled with over-the-top gameplay moments that anyone can enjoy, but only a True ‘Toad’ can master.

With a unique hand-animated cartoon style and packed with memorable characters and locations, the Battletoads are back for a larger-than-life brawl across the universe that promises to be fun alone, and unforgettable together.
